\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	{\mathscr D} \&\& {\mathscr D[T^{-1}]} \\
	{\mathscr C} \&\& {\mathscr C[S^{-1}]}
	\arrow["P", from=1-1, to=1-3]
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "F"', curve={height=12pt}, from=1-1, to=2-1]
	\arrow[""{name=1, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{\overline F}"', curve={height=12pt}, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[""{name=2, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "G"', curve={height=12pt}, from=2-1, to=1-1]
	\arrow["Q"', from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow[""{name=3, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "{\overline G}"', curve={height=12pt}, from=2-3, to=1-3]
	\arrow["\dashv"{description}, draw=none, from=0, to=2]
	\arrow["\dashv"{description}, draw=none, from=1, to=3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
